__e: In Nassau, slaves have seen too many of their own find freedom amongst the crews on the account.
And while we're off selling it at rates you couldn't hope to match, you and your men get to enjoy the many pleasantries Nassau has to offer.
They will find Nassau has destroyed itself.
You intend to lure Silver in. Force him to appear in the square to save his men so that you might defeat him in full view of all of Nassau. Demonstrate your fearsomeness to them.
I came here 'cause we all agreed we had a chance to take Nassau back, have a place of our own.
He'll be gone within the hour, off in search of aid, no doubt, to secure his possession of Nassau, win the war for England.
